thread.title: "We feel unwanted": Jedward want an apology from CBB house as they team up with Kim Woodburn
thread.title_full: "We feel unwanted": Jedward want an apology from CBB house as they team up with Kim Woodburn

author: Lara Martin
title: "We feel unwanted": Jedward want an apology from CBB house as they team up with Kim Woodburn
text:
Jedward have epic meltdown at Nicola and Callum Share this video Watch Next 
Jedward say: “We think [James C] is awesome! He’s too busy flirting with Coleen on a regular basis, flirting with the eyes…eye contact is strong.” 
But Nicola cuts in: “Boys, remember when people are married that is offensive. Just to make you aware.” 
Kim Woodburn then accuses Nicola of picking on the boys. Kim told Nicola she was picking on the twins (Photo: bbuk/Twitter) Read More "You made a reputation by showing your knockers!" CBB's Kim Woodburn takes a swipe at Nicola McLean's Page 3 career 
It leads Jedward and Kim to form a sort of bond, as she’s also been on the receiving end of a fair few insults during the episode - and has thrown a fair few back! 
Jedward reckon Kim is owed an apology by James Cosmo , after the house are shown that clip of him in the Diary Room saying she has “vitriol pouring out of her.” 
“I notice in this house that they can say terrible things to me,” says Kim. Kim talking to Big Brother (Photo: Channel 5) 
Jedward agree, adding: “It’s just awkward…if we’re sitting with them, we don’t support what they’re saying.” 
Kim replies: “A horrible bunch of people in this house…chinless wonders.” 
‘Edward is a sweet boy’. Nicola comments; “John is definitely the driving force, Edward is much more real.” 
*CBB airs 9pm on Channel 5 Read More
